product_name: Big Agnes Wyoming Trail 2 Camp Tent
long_description: The Wyoming Trail 2 Camp tent from Big Agnes is a lightweight, well-built, 3-season backpacking tent. Its oversize main vestibule adds noteworthy versatility! Large main vestibule may be staked out awning style for a protected area to hang out in; stake it out using your own trekking poles, sold separately. 2 doors offer easy access and a small rear vestibule adds extra storage space. Color coded pole ends, webbing and buckles make setup easy. Reflective guylines and webbing on tent corners increase nighttime visibility. Ripstop polyester fly and durable polyester floor have a waterproof polyurethane coating; all seams are taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape. DAC(R) lightweight pole system with Pressfit(R) connectors offers high strength; poles are anodized without the use of harmful acids. Plastic clips and sleeves attach tent body to pole frame. 2 interior mesh pockets and gear loft loops included. Big Agnes Wyoming Trail 2 Camp tent includes stuff sacks and 14 lightweight aluminum hook stakes; footprint is sold separately.
short_description: The Wyoming Trail 2 Camp tent from Big Agnes is a lightweight, well-built, 3-season backpacking tent. Its oversize main vestibule adds noteworthy versatility!
